sn20.3:1.2: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yani kanici kulani bahutthikani appapurisani tani suppadhamsiyani honti corehi kumbhatthenakehi;
sn20.3:1.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettacetovimutti abhavita abahulikata so suppadhamsiyo hoti amanussehi.
sn20.3:1.4: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yani kanici kulani appitthikani bahupurisani tani duppadhamsiyani honti corehi kumbhatthenakehi;
sn20.3:1.5: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno mettacetovimutti bhavita bahulikata so duppadhamsiyo hoti amanussehi.
sn20.3:1.7: ‘metta no cetovimutti bhavita bhavissati bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha’ti.
